attributes.action: Setup a National DNA Database that is voluntary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To setup and promote in schools and hospitals a voluntary national database of DNA. Once a majority of the population submits samples to this database voluntarily; and it is deemed to be of value to the population as a whole, consideration could then be taken to make it a legal requirement with samples taken from all newborns.
